encryptChat

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • encryptChat.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a SSl socket server.To accept a client you need to have router's port open.
    Author:
    Francesco Cozzolino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(ViewObserver controller, ModelInterface model, java.lang.String password)
      Loads the keystore and creates the server;will be listening on the specified port in .ini file and starts a new thread that accepts the clients that have server's keystore.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the server
      void closeClient(java.lang.String ip)
      Removes a client from the list of connected clients
      boolean isConnect(java.lang.String ip)
      Returns the connection state of the client with the specific ip address
      boolean sendFile(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String name)
      Tries to send a file to the client with the specified name
      boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String name)
      Tries to send a message to the client with the specified name

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(ViewObserver controller,
      ModelInterface model,
      java.lang.String password)
       throws java.io.IOException,
              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Loads the keystore and creates the server;will be listening on the specified port in .ini file and starts a new thread that accepts the clients that have server's keystore.
        Parameters:
        controller -
        model -
        password - password of keystore
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the keystore doesn't exist or the password is wrong
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        See Also:
        ViewObserver, ModelInterface

        Tries to send a message to the client with the specified name
        Parameters:
        message -
        name - user's name of client side
        Returns:
        true if the client exist and is connected,false otherwise

      • isConnect

        public boolean isConnect(java.lang.String ip)
        Returns the connection state of the client with the specific ip address
        Parameters:
        ip - Address of client
        Returns:
        true if the client was successfully connected to the server
